Docs.typeparam: The type of the extension objects.
Docs.summary: A collection of the objects that allow for retrieving the by its type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!E Find<E>() cil managed

Docs.summary: Finds the specified extension object in the collection.
Docs.returns: The extension object that was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.IExtensionCollection%601.Find%2A> returns an extension that implements (is or derives from) the specified type. If more than one extension implements the specified type, one is returned. The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] implementation returns the most recently added, but this is not required of implementations. If no extension implements the specified type, <xref:System.ServiceModel.IExtensionCollection%601.Find%2A> returns null.
